subject: [Radiance-general] kbin in Klems_int.cal
body:
German,

I think you need to enclose the kbin in single quotes like this:
-b 'kbin(0,1,0,0,0,1)'

Andy

On Wed, Mar 20, 2013 at 3:51 PM, Germ?n Molina Larrain <gmolina1 at uc.cl>wrote:
